item.title: Day of the dead away from Mexico
item.description: I usually like to hate on Facebook but I‚Äôve got to admit it is useful if used responsibly, this time thanks to it, I found out that a mexican baker had moved to town and I managed to get ‚ÄúPan de Muerto‚Äù (Dead bread?). I feel like I have to describe it for non-mexicans: for starters, it‚Äôs not made of dead people üòõ It‚Äôs like a not so dense bun (with a twist of orange) and covered in sugar.
